name: Firefox Monitor
description:
Have your accounts been leaked or stolen in a data breach? Find out with Firefox Monitor, an experimental service created by Mozilla.

Mozilla is running this study to evaluate a service that alerts users to potential data breaches. Users in the study will receive a notification when they land on a website that has been affected by a data breach or when they open a new tab in Firefox. Users can then search the Firefox Monitor database to see if their account information was compromised. The information about compromised data comes from our partner in this project, haveibeenpwned.com.

Your email address
The Firefox Monitor search tool requires that you enter your email address. Mozilla does not send your email address to any third parties and does not store your email.
